metadata.name: 2044: Forever Mitus
metadata.description:
'2044: The Lost Kanye Files' is a collection of leaked songs from my days signed as a producer to Kanye West.

The first track in this series -- originally titled “Can U Be/Forever Mitus” -- escaped into the darkest regions of Web2, after Kanye debuted the track at a secret listening party.

Revolutionize music ownership in Web3 with this highly-coveted leak.

Rules will be broken, risks will be taken.

The winner will receive a private portal to stream more unreleased leaks via their $LEAK token.
